name: Liberty vs Trump
description: Help Liberty the bald eagle keep the United States Constitution safe from President Trump. Tap your screen to keep your bird in mid-air and see how long you can fly without touching the Donald himself. The more pipes you fly by the higher your score! Score 10 to 19 points and earn a bronze medal. Score 20 to 29 points and earn a silver medal. Score 30 to 39 points and earn a bronze medal. Score 40 or more points and earn a platinum medal! Share your high score on social medial and compare it to the high scores of the other players on the leader board!!!
